siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

nextPage.excerpt: Illustrating an infinite library of programming courses Since April 2015 I've been the art director & lead illustrator for  egghead.io  – a learning website for web developers. For every course we release, I create a unique illustration that captures…
